review: It has some usability issues, I use it with netflix and sometimes is hard to get the ipad app to show the icon, also netflix fails to recognize the advance of the movie you are watching if you stop it and open it on other device. Pausing and playing can also be challenging due to the app loosing the connection with it (after turning the ipad off for instance). It would be nice also it recognises the HDMI CEC command for playing and stoping since you could use the TV remove for that. On the other hand you can turn your TV on with HDMI CEC.
